info.title: IFB398 - Capstone Project 2023
info.description: This API has been created to support Capstone Project in IFB398, Capstone Unit. It exposes a number of REST endpoints. The API endpoints and their usage are described in detail below.

message.example: Authorization header ('Bearer token') not found
JWT token has expired
Invalid JWT token
Authorization header is malformed

get.summary: Get media file by course ID

post.summary: Register a user to a course

200.description: User successfully registered to the course

message.example: User with ID 1 has been registered to course ID 101

400.description: Bad request, such as user already registered to the course

message.example: User is already registered to this course.

post.summary: Mark a lecture as attended for a user

200.description: Lecture marked as attended successfully or course completed

message.example: Lecture with ID 303 has been marked as attended for user ID 1 in course ID 101

400.description: Bad request, such as lecture already attended by the user

message.example: Lecture already attended by the user for this course.
User is not registered for this course.

post.summary: Mark a material as viewed for a user

200.description: Material marked as viewed successfully or course completed

message.example: Material with ID 202 has been marked as viewed for user ID 1 in course ID 101

400.description: Bad request, such as user already viewed the material

message.example: Material already viewed by the user for this course.

404.description: User or course or material not found

message.example: User or course or material not found.

post.summary: Mark a quiz as attempted for a user

200.description: Quiz marked as attempted successfully or course completed

message.example: Quiz with ID 404 has been marked as attempted for user ID 1 in course ID 101

400.description: Bad request, such as quiz already attempted by the user

message.example: Quiz already attempted by the user for this course.
User is not registered for this course.

post.description: Endpoint to create a new forum thread. Requires JWT token in the Authorization header.

post.description: Endpoint to create a new forum comment. Requires JWT token in the Authorization header.

parameters.name: forumComment
parameters.description: Forum comment object that needs to be added.

forumID.description: Id of the forum to post the comment to.

DateCommented.description: Date when the comment was created.

UserID.description: ID of the user who created the comment.

ForumID.description: ID of the forum to which the comment belongs.
